name: The Fairi Affair: A tale of Inverted Edinburgh
name_original: The Fairi Affair: A tale of Inverted Edinburgh
description:
Edinburgh, cradle of the Enlightenment, is up, pointing down.  Above, on the other side of the ground, is the Floor, the kingdom of the Fairis.  But one of their Princes is down in the upside-down city and it's your job to get him.

The Fairi Affair: A tale of Inverted Edinburgh is a short piece of interactive fiction made in a week by Milo van Mesdag as a pastiche of Fallen London.
